protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: Component of a protein kinase signal transduction cascade. Mediates activation of the NF-kappa-B, AP1 and DDIT3 transcriptional regulators

reference.reference_text: Ellinger-Ziegelbauer H, Brown K, Kelly K, Siebenlist U: Direct activation of the stress-activated protein kinase (SAPK) and extracellular signal-regulated protein kinase (ERK) pathways by an inducible mitogen-activated protein Kinase/ERK kinase kinase 3 (MEKK) derivative. J Biol Chem. 1997 Jan 31;272(5):2668-74.
